headline: Semler Scientific Settles DOJ Probe, Says Ready to Buy More Bitcoin
summary: In a Tuesday filing, the company said it had reached a loan agreement with crypto exchange Coinbase allowing it to borrow money — using its bitcoin stockpile as collateral — to pay the settlement.

raw.headline: Semler Scientific Settles DOJ Probe, Says Ready to Buy More Bitcoin
raw.summary: In a Tuesday filing, the company said it had reached a loan agreement with crypto exchange Coinbase allowing it to borrow money — using its bitcoin stockpile as collateral — to pay the settlement.

headline: Coinbase Hits Resistance As Earnings Loom; Is Coin Stock A Buy Or Sell Now?
summary: Coinbase fell on Tuesday, on track to break a two-day winning streak.  Is Coinbase stock a buy or sell now?  On MarketSurge charts from Investor's Business Daily, Coinbase stock has undercut its 200-day moving average.

headline: CleanSpark Ditches Bitcoin  'HODL' Strategy to Stop Dilution Via Equity Raise
summary: CleanSpark's holdings now exceed 12,000 BTC, worth just over $1 billion at current prices.

headline: CleanSpark Expands Capital Strategy With $200M Bitcoin-Backed Credit Facility from Coinbase Prime; Shifts to Self-Funded Operations
summary: Proceeds from credit facility to support accretive growth on non-dilutive termsCompany to begin selling a portion of monthly Bitcoin production to cover operationsLAS VEGAS, April 15, 2025...
